overview: Love that lasts the longest is love that is never returned. Tristan knows this all too well. Despite what he may believe to be true, love seems to be just beyond his reach. Due to circumstances beyond his control, he meets Maya and discovers that she is the girl of his dreams. Lost in a world of isolation, Tristan is determined to be with Maya albeit their social and environmental differences. As their relationship blossoms into more, the world around Tristan begins to unravel as the past comes back to haunt him. Soon Tristan is faced with an important decision. Stay with Maya no matter the cost or take a different path and lose her forever.
title: A Mind Beside Itself
